sentence: يَحْثُنَا النَّبِيُّ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ عَلَى الْعِلْمِ وَالْعَمَلِ وَالسَّعْيِ لِلتَّكَسُّبِ
meaning: The Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him, urges us to seek knowledge, work, and strive to earn a livelihood

words.meaning: Peace and blessings be upon him

sentence: إذَا مَاتَ الإِنْسَانُ انْقَطَعَ عَنْهُ عَمَلُهُ إِلَّا مِن ثَلَاثَةٍ
meaning: When a man dies, his deeds come to an end except for three

sentence: صَدَقَةٍ جَارِيَةٍ، أَوْ عِلْمٍ يُنْتَفَعُ بِهِ، أَوْ وَلَدٍ صَالِحٍ يَدْعُو لَهُ
meaning: An ongoing charity, knowledge that is benefited from, or a righteous child who prays for him

sentence: مَن نَفَّسَ عَن مُؤْمِنٍ كُرْبَةً مِن كُرَبِ الدُّنْيَا، نَفَّسَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُ كُرْبَةً مِن كُرَبِ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
meaning: Whoever relieves a believer of a burden from the burdens of this world, Allah will relieve him of a burden from the burdens of the Day of Resurrection

sentence: مَا أَكَلَ أَحَدٌ طَعَامًا قَطُّ خَيْرًا مِنْ أَنْ يَأْكُلَ مِنْ عَمَلِ يَدِهِ
meaning: No one ever eats better food than that which he earns by working with his own hands
